casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Brittany Sue Opal BRYANT 111P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Anton M. Lebedev, Attorney at Law, for Bryant, Brittany Sue Opal.

Adam Everett, Assistant District Attorney.

Hon. Paul C. Ridgeway, Resident Superior Court Judge.

Hon. Louis Meyer

Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*97The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of April 2019 by Defendant to Withdraw Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
